put.description: Accepts the raw file as body. Explicitly supports curl's --upload-file / -T parameter.

Response Senddocumentform V1 Action Send Post

put.description: Accepts the raw file as body. Explicitly supports curl's --upload-file / -T parameter.

post.description: upload a new document to the processes

schema.title: Response Add Document V1 Processes  Process Id  Documents Post
Response Update Metadata V1 Processes  Process Id  Metadata Put
Response Register Error V1 Processes  Process Id  Process Error Post
Response Find Owner V1 Ownership By Endpoint Get

owner_id.title: Owner Id
owner_id.description: ID of the owning object. Key may be one of 'org', 'inbox', 'transfer'. Only one type of owner may be specified. If the owner is not a transfer, a new transfer will be created on the fly.

valid_until.title: Valid Until
valid_until.description: Defines expiry of this Key. Max lifetime 180 days, default 10 days.

org_id.title: Org Id
org_id.description: Organization this key is valid for. If key is created in context of an organization, context takes precedence.

ApiKey.description:
Simple(r) systems may access the API through an API key.
the API key has to be prefixed with 'ApiKey' instead of 'Bearer' as in
```
ApiKey <your api key as provided>
```
ApiKey.name: Authorization
